##Anotations

YAY!

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(plotly)

m <- mtcars[which.max(mtcars$mpg), ]

a <- list(
  x = m$wt,
  y = m$mpg,
  text = rownames(m),
  xref = "x",
  yref = "y",
  showarrow = TRUE,
  arrowhead = 7,
  ax = 20,
  ay = -40
)

plot_ly(mtcars, x = ~wt, y = ~mpg) %>%
  add_markers() %>%
  layout(annotations = a)

```
